name: AwesomeBlue Vs CSxTBM Megaverse: Absolute Zero
name_original: AwesomeBlue Vs CSxTBM Megaverse: Absolute Zero
description:
This is the sequel to The Chronicles of LD2000 Vs CSxTBM Megaverse: The Final Showdown.

This time, Trans-City Combine will try to invade 2 universes, while AwesomeBlue and CSxTBM's team trying to stop them.

This game has 28 characters, lots of stage, new bosses and minigames. Advanced AI and others in the full version.

The full version will come out soon. Try the demo for now.

Thanks for playing! I hope you enjoyed.

~AwesomeBlue
